snippet: A federal program that grants so-called EB-5 visas to foreigners who invest at least $500,000 in an American business has become a popular source of cheap financing for hotel companies.
abstract: A federal program that grants so-called EB-5 visas to foreigners who invest at least $500,000 in an American business has become a popular source of cheap financing for hotel companies.

headline.main: Visas-for-Dollars Program a Boon to Hotel Developers
headline.print_headline: Visas-for-Dollars Program a Boon to Hotel Developers
